document_data.name: Hillock Court
document_data.mainbody: '''Hillock Court''' was a courtyard that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Hillock Court was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] at the base of [[Castle Waterdeep]]. The court sat south of [[Waterdeep Way]] and north and west of [[Watchmen's Way]]. [[Niles Way]] connected with the northern part of the courtyard.
